review: The Fire TV iPhone app does not allow pasting into it.  This is almost a deal breaker for me, since I use a password manager and have long, complicated passwords for the online services I use, like Netflix.  To contrast, the Roku app allows pasting into it, and thus was fairly easy to set up once it connected to the WiFi.
author: Veronique

review: Almost zero glitches while watching tv, I think it's the best purchase I've made all year. The remote doesn't require a direct line of sight and is extremely simple to operate. I believe I'll never find a better way to enjoy television.
